title: Denies Epstein Friendship Despite Photos and Own Quotes
summary: Trump claims he 'was not a fan' of Jeffrey Epstein and 'had a falling out with him.' However, documented evidence shows a close 15-year friendship. 2002 Trump quote: 'I've known Jeff for fifteen years. Terrific guy. He's a lot of fun to be with...he likes beautiful women as much as I do, and many of them are on the younger side.' Flight logs, party photos, and witness accounts document frequent contact. Trump now denies or minimizes this relationship.
keyFacts: 1992-2007: Extensive documentation of Trump-Epstein friendship spanning 15 years
2002 New York Magazine profile: Trump called Epstein 'a terrific guy' who 'likes beautiful women as much as I do, and many of them are on the younger side'
Flight logs show Trump flew on Epstein's plane at least 7 times
Multiple photos show Trump and Epstein together at Mar-a-Lago and NYC parties in the 1990s-2000s
1992 video: Trump and Epstein together at Mar-a-Lago party, laughing and pointing at women
Epstein had 14 phone numbers for Trump in his contact book
2019-present: Trump claims 'I was not a fan of his' and 'I had a falling out with him'
Never explains when or why the 'falling out' occurred - no contemporaneous evidence of it
2019: Trump suggests Epstein death was suspicious, implies Clintons involved - deflection from own ties
Epstein accuser Virginia Giuffre says she saw Trump at Epstein's Palm Beach mansion
Trump banned Epstein from Mar-a-Lago allegedly over hitting on member's daughter, but timeline is murky and no documentation
